Antheraea Mylitta Brasil Atheraea Mylitta is one of the most beautiful butterflies in the word Butterflay_Silvery_Blue canada this canadial native species likes to extract minerals from wet soil fairy wings butterflay indonesia can be found in several areas in papua Banded_Orange Sulawesi a rare species of butterflay from brazil that can absord nutrients from mud //Jerapah Gifraffa_camelopasrdalis Afrika_utara Even-toed ungulates are endemic to Africa and are the tallest animal species that live on land Reticulated_giraffe Ethopia_selatan we can recognize it from the color of its skin which is reddish brown in color, and bright white lines form a large net-like pattern around its body. Southern_giraffe afrika_selatan Southern giraffes have rounded or mottled spots, some with star-like extensions on a light brown background, running down the hooves Masai_giraffe afrika_timur "The Masai giraffe can be found in central and southern Kenya and in Tanzania. It has distinctive, irregular, jagged, star-like patches that extend to the nail " //kelinci netherland_dwarf Belanda Rabbit originating from the Netherlands weighing 1.1-2.5 pounds, the Dutch Dwarf is one of the smallest rabbit breeds orictolagus_cuniculus eropa The rabbit Orictolagus cuniculus also called the European rabbit or the domestic rabbit is the only species in its genus holland_lop Belanda "Holland Lop rabbits are independent and playful rabbits " mini_lop jerman "Is a type of domestic rabbit that is recognized by the American Rabbit Association " Giant belgia "a very large breed of domestic rabbit, usually considered the largest breed of its species " rex prancis This rabbit has a large body, erect ears, and the characteristic that makes this Rex rabbit preferred is its carpet-like fur.
